title: Creating an Equation
text: If we let $$n$$ be an even number, then we know that $$n\left(n+2\right)=624$$. We can simplify this to get $$n^2+2n-624=0$$.

title: Solving the Equation
text: Using the quadratic formula, we get $$n=24, -26$$. We can remove the negative solution. So, the two consecutive odd numbers are $$24$$ and $$26$$.
